text:
When I use the optional task vssget with the arguments label="0.2.0-b16" and 
recursive="true", it does not get any recursive file for the specified label. 
It only gets the files that are located directly in the specified vsspath.
creator: bgzll@vogelzang.demon.nl
bgzll@vogelzang.demon.nl
text:
The message ant shows:  
..
[vssget] Version not found

creator: bgzll@vogelzang.demon.nl
text:
According to http://support.microsoft.com/default.aspx?scid=kb;EN-US;197050 
this doesn't seem to be a bug in Ant but its a MSVSS bug. I should have known 
better........
